name: WinBall (HD)
description: WinBall (HD) is a variant of the game Arkanoid with 50 increasingly complex levels and the usual combo bonuses. Unlike the classic Arkanoid this version features a "magnet" that affects the trajectory of the ball. Overall the game is very simple, with a screen full of shimmering and glittering objects which look nice but aren't meant to be a distraction. As in any game of this type, there is a table of records, different settings for sounds and graphics, and the option to continue the game after the loss of all lives (but with the loss of all points).
